#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
char a[1000005],b[1000005];
int main()
{
    ll t,ans,mi;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a;
        cin>>b;
        ll c2=0,c3=0,c1=0,c4=0,i;
        ll n =  strlen(a);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
           if(a[i]=='0' && b[i]=='0')
                c1++;
           else if(a[i]=='1' && b[i]=='0')
                c2++;
            else if(a[i]=='0' && b[i]=='1')
                c3++;
            else c4++;
        }
        ans = 0;
        mi = min(c2,c3);
        c2 = c2-mi;
        c3 = c3-mi;
        c1 +=mi;
        c4+=mi;
        if(c2==0 && c3==0)
            ans=mi;
        else if(c2>0)
        {
            if(c1>0)
                ans=c2+mi;
            else ans=-1;
        }
        else if(c3>0)
        {
            if(c4>0)
                ans=c3+mi;
            else ans=-1;
        }

        if(ans!=-1)
            printf("Lucky Chef\n%d\n",ans);
        else printf("Unlucky Chef\n");

    }
    return 0;
}
